title: Border, 1850–75
description:
Narrow border, with wide band of vining flowers, alternating between lavender and pink flowers. A green band along bottom edge. There is a burgundy flock background behing the wide top band. Printed in burgundy flock, lavender, pink and green on a white ground.

H# 367

tombstone.epitaph:
Border, 1850–75.
1850–75. Block-printed on machine-made paper. Gift of Josephine Howell. 1972-42-126-a,b.
